subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Harvey will take the mound Tuesday night at Kansas City, followed by Jacob deGrom. Whether Yoenis Cespedes will buoy Harvey in the Mets’ lineup remains uncertain.
snippet: Harvey will take the mound Tuesday night at Kansas City, followed by Jacob deGrom. Whether Yoenis Cespedes will buoy Harvey in the Mets’ lineup remains uncertain.
